actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Executive Comment Requested from DOD, GSA, Interior, OMB.
Referred to Subcommittee on Government Activities and Transportation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Government Activities and Transportation

official_title: A bill to provide that topsoil declared to be surplus property in connection with the construction of a dam by the United States may be donated to local governments, local public agencies, and private, nonprofit organizations.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to direct an executive agency which is responsible for the construction of a dam to donate surplus topsoil to local governments, local public agencies, and private, nonprofit agencies on the condition that the recipient shall not transfer the topsoil for consideration.

titles.title: A bill to provide that topsoil declared to be surplus property in connection with the construction of a dam by the United States may be donated to local governments, local public agencies, and private, nonprofit organizations.
